system.effect:
Snag Machines are extremely illegal machines that allow trainers to steal another Trainer’s Pokémon. The Snag Machine is an Accessory-Slot Item, generally worn on one arm. When a Trainer inserts a Poké Ball into the Snag Machine, they may spend a Swift Action to turn the Poké Ball into a Snag Ball (as in, a Ball affected by a Snag Case) until it is thrown, or the Scene ends.

Snag Machines cannot be bought in stores, but may be sold on the black market for prices of $30,000 or more.
